headline: FirstEnergy plans to add capacity for data centers, but shield customers from costs
summary: Amid a data center boom, FirstEnergy plans to increase its system peak load by nearly 50% over the next decade. Company reports increased 3Q revenue.

headline: 5 Stocks With Robust Sales Growth to Buy Amid a Challenging Backdrop
summary: Amid market volatility, strong sales growth makes stocks like Lamb Weston, UHS, FirstEnergy, NetEase and JPMorgan compelling buys.

headline: These stocks are the real deal for investors in AI — Wall Street is just chasing bubbles
summary: The stock market has mispriced the AI boom. The big moneymakers are providing the electrical power and infrastructure.

headline: FirstEnergy expects peak load to grow 45% by 2035 on data centers
summary: In the first nine months this year, electric sales grew 1% from the same period in 2024 but were essentially flat on a weather-adjusted basis. The company anticipates “more meaningful” increases starting in the fourth quarter.
